long_description: Taking skate-inspired style to your everyday bike commute, the Bern Macon Bike Helmet features a removable visor and 10 vents to keep you cool on all your biking adventures. ABS shell with EPS hard foam provides reliable protection in a low-profile design. Air channels pull air through front vents and allow air to exit through back vents. Built-in visor can be flipped up or down to suit style or visibility, or remove it altogether for a minimalist look. Bern Macon EPS bike helmet meets ASTM F 2040 and EN 1077 standards for snow and ski, and CPSC and EN 1078 for bike and skate. Closeout.
